New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 6 月 14 日星期五 04:14:25 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Missing Marokopa family: Waikato police scale back search in Marokopa for fugitive Tom Phillips https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-marokopa-family-waikato-police-scale-back-search-in-marokopa-for-fugitive-tom-phillips/4NJLGGFOENFVNOAYDLK6VV5CU4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-marokopa-family-waikato-police-scale-back-search-in-marokopa-for-fugitive-tom-phillips/4NJLGGFOENFVNOAYDLK6VV5CU4/ Police offered an $80,000 reward for information on Phillips' three children. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 04:02:01 +0000 The children of Tom Phillips: Jayda, Maverick and Ember. A $80,000 reward has been put up to find the three children, who have been missing for two and a half years. Photo / NZME
Katikati Volunteer Fire Brigade save little old lady from beeping smoke alarm https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/katikati-advertiser/katikati-volunteer-fire-brigade-save-little-old-lady-from-beeping-smoke-alarm/JPLUP6UNVFD73H4ODXLBN7FQLM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/katikati-advertiser/katikati-volunteer-fire-brigade-save-little-old-lady-from-beeping-smoke-alarm/JPLUP6UNVFD73H4ODXLBN7FQLM/ Rebecca MaugerCarole Moselen thought she was getting advice, next minute the town siren goes off. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Carole Moselen, who has mobility issues, had the big guns arrive when her smoke alarm started peeping.
Todd McClay announces cancellation of annual ETS charge for forestry https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/todd-mcclay-announces-cancellation-of-annual-ets-charge-for-forestry/SWVMMSBN2NAHVGDC5S6DJJAXVY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/todd-mcclay-announces-cancellation-of-annual-ets-charge-for-forestry/SWVMMSBN2NAHVGDC5S6DJJAXVY/ Forestry Minister Todd McClay made the announcement to industry leaders in Waikato. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 03:56:33 +0000 Forestry Minister Todd McClay has announced the Government is cancelling this year’s annual service charges for forestry under the emissions trading scheme. Photo / Mark Mitchell
Baby Mustafa death: Man charged with murder after death of boy https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/baby-mustafa-death-man-charged-with-murder-after-death-of-boy/JN4T3AEBDVC2XBSIEAG4GFWQZ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/baby-mustafa-death-man-charged-with-murder-after-death-of-boy/JN4T3AEBDVC2XBSIEAG4GFWQZ4/ Police said 'there is the possibility of further charges'. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 03:29:25 +0000 A man has been charged with murder after the death of Baby Mustafa. Photo / Mike Scott / Supplied
Public Service Commission reveals scope of inquiry into data misuse claims https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/public-service-commission-reveals-scope-of-inquiry-into-data-misuse-claims/TGBQVVNH5NA7DOS4DYYVPA4BZE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/public-service-commission-reveals-scope-of-inquiry-into-data-misuse-claims/TGBQVVNH5NA7DOS4DYYVPA4BZE/ Michael Heron, KC, and Pania Gray to lead Public Service Commission investigation. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 03:19:20 +0000 Prime Minister Christopher Luxon this week directed the Public Service Commissioner to investigate the “safeguards” in place to ensure personal information is being used appropriately by third parties. Photo / Mark Mitchell
Aoraki/Mt Cook rescue: Solo climber found after freezing night on mountain https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/aorakimt-cook-rescue-solo-climber-found-after-freezing-night-on-mountain/56NVCJQHXFHZBHY4R4AHYVCB64/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/aorakimt-cook-rescue-solo-climber-found-after-freezing-night-on-mountain/56NVCJQHXFHZBHY4R4AHYVCB64/ Katie OliverThe man raised the alarm yesterday after he fell while climbing Boys Glacier. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 03:07:56 +0000 Maritime New Zealand’s Rescue Co-ordination Centre located and rescued a climber who fell on Boys Glacier in Aoraki/Mount Cook National Park and spent a night out in freezing conditions.
Hawke’s Bay news in brief: Two lane Vicarage Bridge rebuild enters next stage https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-news-in-brief-kids-draw-parents-for-new-higgins-bitumen-truck/MMJB5KI4VZDE7K5GQ4SOOI4HNA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-news-in-brief-kids-draw-parents-for-new-higgins-bitumen-truck/MMJB5KI4VZDE7K5GQ4SOOI4HNA/ The new bridge, with two lanes and a shared footpath, will be finished in mid-2025. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 03:02:46 +0000 Work on a a new and improved two lane bridge across the Tūtaekurī River at Puketapu is expected to be complete by mid-2025. Photo / Hastings District Council

Threat of future pandemic is real and bird flu is a reminder - Covid-19 response commission https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/threat-of-future-pandemic-is-real-and-bird-flu-is-a-reminder-covid-19-response-commission/OAIPWXXWQJGJRCSECJY4G43CXI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/threat-of-future-pandemic-is-real-and-bird-flu-is-a-reminder-covid-19-response-commission/OAIPWXXWQJGJRCSECJY4G43CXI/ Commission head says it's watching international bird flu cases carefully.
